yes, i am okay with adding this comment, i am not happy with all the hassle around it though, it makes me reluctant to comment at all if every fixup is going to result in a new PR cycle\n\ni would also ideally prefer putting some more effort in it: prevent that error from happening in the first place, so that no one has to be surprised by it, for example by checking if there are `tc` rules and n
